	type = character_event

	override_background = {

		event_background = gallows

	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 5
				}
				# Handjob
				# 
				desc = sex_transition_5
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10003
				}
				# 3: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# You're too turned on to be satisfied with just jerking him off\n
				desc = sex_transition_10003
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 3
			}
			# defaulted to 5: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsCum.HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
			desc = sex_transition_5
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.1.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.22
	}
}

				}

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 18
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# 
				desc = sex_transition_18
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10008
				}
				# 8: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his pubes, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10008
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10009
				}
				# 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10009
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10014
				}
				# 14: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10014
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 12: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition_12
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 6
			}
			# defaulted to 18: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition_18
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.3.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0

			DRAMA = yes

			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}

	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.24

		event_background = alley_night

	override_background = {

		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night

		event_background = corridor_night

	override_background = {

		event_background = corridor_day

	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 11
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# 
				desc = sex_transition_11
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10008
				}
				# 8: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his pubes, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10008
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10009
				}
				# 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10009
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 11: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM
			desc = sex_transition_11
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.2.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.25
	}
}

	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 17
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# 
				desc = sex_transition_17
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 21
				}
				# Deepthroat
				# 
				desc = sex_transition_21
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10014
				}
				# 14: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10014
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10019
				}
				# 19: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10019
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 6
			}
			# defaulted to 17: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition_17
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 7
			}
			# defaulted to 21: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition_21
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.6.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 25
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.26
	}
}
LIDAc.4 = {
	# A Firm Grasp on His Release
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.4.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 13
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# 
				desc = sex_transition_13
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10008
				}
				# 8: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his pubes, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10008
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10009
				}
				# 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10009
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 13: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM
			desc = sex_transition_13
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.4.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 35
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 35
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.27
	}
